e6 Place the woman in the supine position with her legs fl  exed and apart.
/circle6 Perform the vaginal examination very gently, wearing clean/sterile gloves. 
/circle6 Clean the vulva and perineal area with a mild antiseptic solution. Wipe the vulva fi  rst, 
then labia majora and lastly labia minora with cotton swabs from the anterior to the 
posterior direction. Use a swab only once. Use separate swabs for each side.
/circle6 Separate the labia with the thumb and forefi  nger of the left  ha
